file_content.text: [Your current mission objective is located at the Central District of New Adasta. A transport is ready for departure.]
[Your current mission objective is located at the People's Tower in New Adasta. A transport is ready for departure.]

[Imperial military forces on Ziost have ceased responding to orbital comm signals. Reports indicate the military has turned on the civilian populace. An Imperial military outpost may yield more information. A transport is available for departure.]
[The transport is fueled and ready for departure to a designated landing zone on Ziost.]

[You make note of a warning that planetary traffic-control stations are unresponsive. However, orbital sensors report that Ziost's atmosphere remains within acceptable levels. Transport is available for departure to a designated landing zone.]

[You notice a warning that orbital sensors detect a "planetary anomaly". A widespread crisis may be imminent. If you choose to investigate, further travel to Ziost's surface may become impossible, leaving any open concerns there unresolved.]
[You are unable to access the Ziost Departures Terminal without a valid set of coordinates and clearance codes.]
